title: Nick Kyrgios lashes out at ‘boring’ Casper Ruud after ‘idiot’ dig
text:
Kyrgios was unamused by Ruud’s interview (Picture: Getty Images for Laver Cup)

Nick Kyrgios has fired back at fellow ATP star Casper Ruud, after being branded an ‘idiot’ and ‘totally crazy’ by the Norwegian, labelling his tennis ‘boring’.

Tensions have run high between the pair since their first meeting at the Rome Masters earlier this year.

Kyrgios, 24, was disqualified after throwing a chair onto the court in rage and Ruud, 20, celebrated his victory by default wildly, a move that didn’t sit well with the Aussie bad boy.

Ruud called Kyrgios an ‘idiot’ (Picture: AFP/Getty Images)

Five months on, Ruud reignited the row and defended his decision to celebrate.

‘I saw that he wrote a little about it,’ Ruud told Tennisportalen. ‘Okay, he got disqualified but if we look at the head-to-head between me and Kyrgios it’s 1-0 to me. That means I’ve won against him?

‘He can say as much as he wants about me getting disqualified but it still says 1-0 to me. I don’t know, he was totally crazy when I played him.

‘It was nice to win. If I celebrated after the match or not? I don’t care. I was happy I got 90 points and $50,000 in prize money so why wouldn’t I celebrate?

‘It’s his problem that he’s an idiot on court.’

Kyrgios did not take kindly to being attacked in an interview and took to Twitter to lash out at Ruud.

But again, I also understand why you have to keep my name in your mouth, because people dont even realise that you play tennis 😂 goodluck in Milan champ x — Nicholas Kyrgios (@NickKyrgios) October 24, 2019

‘Hey @CasperRuud98 next time you have something to say, I would appreciate you say it to my face, I’m sure you wouldn’t run your mouth so much after that,’ he wrote.

‘Until then I will continue to rather watch paint dry than watch you play tennis, boring af [as f**k].

‘But again, I also understand why you have to keep my name in your mouth, because people dont even realise that you play tennis 😂 good luck in Milan champ x’
